title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
EB: The second time I attempt to select the same item, it can be selected as expected.
SR: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Click on any item in the outline view.
3. Observe that the first attempt to select an item results in the focus being moved to the library file node instead of selecting the item.
4. Repeat step 2 and observe that the item can now be selected as expected.
